page.title: 18Leisure Outside Swineshead
page.content: Those wishing to learn new hobbies can take up the facilities of Sharnbrook Upper School, which in the Autumn is offering various evening and day courses,anything from wine making to learning a new language. If one is prepared to travel into the nearest towns: Bedford, Rushden or Milton Keynes one is able to join various sports clubs: Bedford Rowing Club, Mowsbury Golf Club, The Squash Club to name but a few, or you can pursue other leisure activities eg. Railway Clubs, Lace Making.
